# Group discussion 1

1. What experiences have you had with ethical decisions as a student and/or early career researcher? Try to give examples.

2. Read over the [Royal Society Te Apārangi](https://www.royalsociety.org.nz/assets/Uploads/Code-Overview-A3-web.pdf) Code of Professional Standards and Ethics in Science, Technology, and the Humanities. 

2. Describe a possible workflow for biological research. Come up with a possible ethical decision 

Bonus activity

If you have time, do one of the following:
- Rewrite one of the values & principles of responsibility & standards using the most intense slang you can.

OR 

- Make a bad motivational poster for one of the principles from the  [Royal Society Te Apārangi Code](https://www.royalsociety.org.nz/assets/Uploads/Code-Overview-A3-web.pdf)
  - There is a generator you can use [here](https://bighugelabs.com/motivator.php) (and you can get free photos from [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/))
